title: STK offers $30 lunch menu during Charlotte Restaurant Week
statement: STK offers a $30 prix-fixe lunch menu featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak during Charlotte Restaurant Week.

citations.quote: enjoy our exclusive prix-fixe menus, including a $30 Lunch featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak
